Doyle (Pennsylvania Regional Office)

★★★★★ 4.8/5 (1 reviews)

About Doyle (Pennsylvania Regional Office)

Doyle (Pennsylvania Regional Office) provides professional art appraisal services in Philadelphia. With expertise in Fine art, Jewelry, Asian works, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.

Specialties

Fine artJewelryAsian works

Services

  • Auction-based appraisals
  • Estate and collection valuations

Pricing

Commission-based consignment fees; auction commissions apply

Certifications

  • ASA accreditation (implied)

Contact Information

Experience: Since 1962

Additional Information

Part of a global auction house with an active regional advisor.
